tutorials.description: We'll introduce the queue. If it overflows, it's game over!

steps.title: Introducing the Queue
steps.text:
As Shermies come in, you must assign them to goals at the top. 
If the queue fills up and you fall behind, it will cause a game over!

tutorials.description: We'll introduce the color code. The right ticket needs to get to the right tech.

steps.title: Color-Coding Tickets
steps.text:
When Shermie is assigned a specific color. 
Make sure that it will reach the corresponding color to score bonus points.

tutorials.description:
We'll introduce Gates. 
Sometimes a tech is out of office, and you can't send a ticket to them.

steps.title: Gate Barriers
steps.text:
Some goal zones will be blocked at certain times. 
Be careful and plan your moves to avoid sending Shermie to closed gates.

tutorials.description:
We'll introduce Bomb Shermie. 
Some tickets are time-critical,take care of them quickly!

steps.title: Bomb Shermie
steps.text:
Some tickets are 'bombs'—they need to reach their goal as soon as possible. 
Be quick, or the bomb will explode!

tutorials.description:
We'll introduce Toxic Shermie. 
Some tickets need to be delayed and put back into the queue.

steps.title: Toxic Shermie
steps.text:
Toxic Shermies are light green in color. 
They need to be sent to a hospital area to clear their toxicity before they can be processed again.

tutorials.description:
We'll introduce Powerup 1: Invulnerability. 
Some tickets are much easier to handle once you use this powerup!

steps.title: Invulnerability Powerup
steps.text:
When you use this powerup, Shermie will receive a short period of invulnerability. 
During this time, the Shermie can pass through obstacles without being harmed.

tutorials.description:
We'll introduce Powerup 2: Cleanse. 
Some tickets are cause by events that is outside

steps.title: Cleanse Powerup
steps.text:
This powerup clears any negative status (like toxic or bomb effects) currently affecting Shermie. 
After using Cleanse, the Shermie becomes a regular, healthy Shermie again.

tutorials.description:
We'll introduce Powerup 3: Self Service. 
Tickets can be solved by on their own sometimes.

steps.title: Powerup 3
steps.text: Powerup 3 makes managing your queue easier, by removing one Shermie from the queue.

tutorials.description: This is the final challenge, where everything you’ve learned will be put to the test!

steps.title: Last Test
steps.text:
Now that you've mastered all the mechanics, it’s time for the ultimate test. 
Can you handle the pressure and keep the queue under control? Good luck!
